uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.bioportal

Class BioportalConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.bioportal.BioportalConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioportalConfigMBean

    public class BioportalConfig
extends Object
implements BioportalConfigMBean
    Configuration object for BioPortal proxies. This bean should be used as a singleton.
    Configurable properties (via JMX):
    • apiKey *: the API key required to make requests to the BioPortalweb service.
    • searchUrl *: URL used to search BioPortal. It must include the following placeholders to be replaced with values for the query parameters:
      • {0}: ontology names: a comma-separated list of ontology names (as enumerated in BioportalOntology)
      • {1}: query
      • {2}: api key
      If any of these placeholders are missing, the URL should have them hardcoded.
    • getUrl *: URL used to get classes (concepts) from BioPortal. It must include the following placeholders to be replaced with values for the query parameters:
      • {0}: ontology name: the name of an ontology, as enumerated in BioportalOntology.
      • {1}: class id: the URI of the searched class (concept).
      • {2}: apiKey
    • useProxy: (not used) use proxy to connect to BioPortal? Defaults to true.
    • timeout: timeout in milliseconds for the connections to BiopPortal.
    * Please note that both searchUrl and getUrl should include a parameter apikey, obtained after registering to the service (free).
    Author:
    rafa

      • getSearchUrl

        public String getSearchUrl()
        Specified by:
        getSearchUrl in interface BioportalConfigMBean

      • setSearchUrl

        public void setSearchUrl(String searchUrl)
        Description copied from interface: BioportalConfigMBean
        Sets the Bioportal URL used for searches. It can contain the following placeholders (see MessageFormat javadocs):
        • {0} for the ontology ID (ex. 1136 for EFO)
        • {1} for the query
        • {2} set to 1 for exact matches only, 0 otherwise
        Specified by:
        setSearchUrl in interface BioportalConfigMBean
        Parameters:
        searchUrl - the Bioportal URL for searches.

      • getGetUrl

        public String getGetUrl()
        Specified by:
        getGetUrl in interface BioportalConfigMBean

      • setGetUrl

        public void setGetUrl(String getUrl)
        Description copied from interface: BioportalConfigMBean
        Sets the Bioportal URL used to get individual concepts. It can contain the following placeholders (see MessageFormat javadocs):
        • {0} for the ontology version ID (ex. 46765 for EFO 2.20)
        • {1} for the concept ID, including the ontology prefix (ex. 'efo:' for EFO).
        • {2} set to 1 for exact matches only, 0 otherwise
        Specified by:
        setGetUrl in interface BioportalConfigMBean

        Specified by:
